reviews.course_name: Introduction to German Literature, German Literature in World Context
reviews.review_content:
She's clearly passionate about her job and really kind, plus not a hard grader -- nothing bad to say!
Workload:
Weekly discussion posts, readings for each class, 2 papers (one 4 pages, one 7 pages).

Great instructor. Offers different courses concerning literature and arts in the German department. 
Workload is manageable. Very caring and involved. Absolute Gem.

Workload:
Several readings per week (manageable)
Depending on class, 3+ short papers + 1+ Essay (f.e. Final)
Presentation 15+ min.
